title: Virtual Simulation and Serious Game-Based Nursing Clinical Reasoning Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and at least 3 years of clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Blended education combining real-time video lectures and virtual simulation platforms for practicing nurses.

learning_goals: Perform scientific evidence-based clinical judgments with at least 85% accuracy in virtual patient scenarios.
Reduce clinical reasoning errors by 50% through decision-making processes in serious game environments.
Develop improvement plans under peer feedback and instructor guidance during debriefing after simulation-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
